liveMetrics.description: *Total Sales are* **`metric:total_sales`**, while the *Average Sale Amount* is: **`metric:average_sale_amount`**. The live metrics can be referenced both using its identifier or uri(on Bear). The metric will also be formatted/colored when it has a format defined.
